subject: [Radiance-general] fatal - unexpected EOF reading file.smx
body:
The tutorial is slightly out-of-date with respect to the latest tools.  You no longer need the "-n 8760" option to dctimestep, as it gets this information from the sky matrix header.  Try again without that option.

Best,
-Greg
